import React from "react"; import "../../Styles/solutions.css"; const Schools = () => { const features = [ { icon: "??", title: "Digital Curriculum Management", description: "Centralized platform for creating, managing, and distributing digital curriculum aligned with educational standards." }, { icon: "?????", title: "Teacher Empowerment Suite", description: "Lesson planning tools, gradebook, attendance tracking, and communication platform for educators." }, { icon: "??", title: "Personalized Student Learning", description: "Adaptive learning paths, interactive assessments, and progress tracking for every student." }, { icon: "??", title: "Analytics & Reporting", description: "Real-time dashboards for administrators to monitor performance, attendance, and engagement metrics." }, { icon: "??", title: "Parent Engagement Portal", description: "Direct communication channel for parents to track student progress and school announcements." }, { icon: "??", title: "Security & Compliance", description: "Enterprise-grade security, data privacy compliance, and role-based access controls." } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: "Dr. Sarah Johnson", role: "Principal, Greenwood High", quote: "This platform reduced our administrative workload by 60% and improved parent-teacher communication significantly." }, { name: "Michael Chen", role: "IT Director, City Schools District", quote: "The seamless integration with existing systems and robust analytics have transformed how we make data-driven decisions." } ]; return (
